DOC.criteria: •Participants deem eligible candidate spinal anesthesia undergo Laparoscopic Colonic Surgery •Existing cognitive impairment evidence MiniMental State Examination score 24 ( 30 possible point ) A history neurological psychiatric disease include stroke , psychosis Severe visual hearing impairment Unwillingness comply protocol procedure
